title: Pork and Butternut Squash Stew
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '675g boneless pork, cut into 1.25cm cubes', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped', '750ml chicken stock', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed', '1/4 teaspoon dried sage, rubbed', '1 bay leaf', '425g cubed butternut squash', '2 apples, cored and cubed', '2 large potatoes, peeled and cubed', '250g carrots, peeled and diced']
